pages.text: The Golden Heart grants the player the Absorption effect. When the effect is about to run out, it is applied again, resetting the amount of remaining absorption hearts. This curio can (rarely) be found in bastion treasure chests.

The Golden Heart supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Protection$(): Max health given by this curio is increased slightly per level$(br2)$(l)Efficiency$(): Absorption hearts take slightly less time to regenerate per level
